BackgroundPlaybackNotification

class BackgroundPlaybackNotification : PlaybackNotificationImpl

Manages the notification displayed with a MediaPlayback.

MediaPlaybackService
Link copied to clipboard
class MediaPlaybackService

The service that holds a reference to the MediaPlayback which controls playback and displaying the on-going notification of the service. The reference is held to continue playback after the activity is backgrounded.

PlaybackNotificationImpl
Link copied to clipboard
abstract class PlaybackNotificationImpl

Base class for creating and updating a media-style notification.
